item.title: Fast multi-level model with lme4
item.description: References: Steven V. Miller: Mixed Effects Modeling Tips: Use a Fast Optimizer, but Perform Optimizer Checks lme4: lme4 Performance Tips lme4::glmer vs. Stata’s melogit command library(lme4) f_lmer4_logit2 <- glmer(y ~ x1 + x2 + (1 + x1 | id), data = z, family = binomial(link = "logit"), nAGQ = 0L, control = glmerControl(optimizer="NLOPT_LN_BOBYQA", calc.derivs = FALSE, optCtrl=list(maxfun=2e5, method = "nlminb", starttests = FALSE, kkt = FALSE)))
